channel.title: Joke Thread
channel.description:
Post your jokes. Rep++ if you like them, Rep-- if you don't. I will have the best 5 jokes on a section in the main post. [center]_______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ [u][b]Best Jokes[/b][/u] _______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________[/center] I'll start it off with a joke:
A Russian couple walks down a street in Moscow when the man feels a drop hit his nose. "I think it's raining," he says to his wife. "No, that feels like snow to me, dear," she replies. Just then, a minor communist party official walks towards them. "Let's not fight about it," the man says. "Let's ask Comrade Rudolph whether it's officially raining or snowing." "It's raining, of course," Comrade Rudolph says and walks on. But the woman insists, "I know that felt like snow." To which the man quietly says, "Rudolph the Red knows rain, dear."

item.title: Joke Thread
item.dc:creator: @R_A_R_E_S R A R E S
item.description:
@R_A_R_E_S wrote:

Dad : Son! Did you know masterbating to much can make you blind!? Son : Dad! I'm over here.

What is the difference between a girl and a computer? The computer will accept a 3 1/2 floppy.
What do you do if you see a black man lying on the ground bleeding from a bullet wound? Stop laughing and reload.
How do you stop a black man from drowning? Get your foot off his head.
What were they missing in the million man march? An auctioneer
Two black men jump off a building, One with a brick and one with a rock who lands first? Who cares?
A plane is flying through the air when all of a sudden the a man comes in from the cockpit and says "we need to make this plane lighter or we will all die and the only fair way to decide who we will release to sacrafice we will be listing races in alphabetical order." The people seem to be fine with this decision. "ok! then we will start with A's . . . do we have any african americans on the plane?" a little black boy looks at his father, but doesn't say anything. "no? ok do we have any blacks on the plane?" The little black boy looks at his father again still silent. "no?? ok do we have any colors on the plane?" The son finally looks at his dad and says "dad arn't we all three of those things?" his father looks at him and says "no son . . . today we are niggers.

Hope you enjoy

Read full topic

item.title: Joke Thread
item.dc:creator: @John459 John459
item.description:
@John459 wrote:

[quote=“IlikeArrays, post:12, topic:372517”]@John459, I heard that joke like 6 years ago Not to mention you wrote it wrong.

How do you fix a woman’s watch?
You don’t. There’s a clock on the stove.[/quote]

Last time I checked there are multiple versions of jokes. It isn’t written wrong, just differently.

Read full topic

item.title: Joke Thread
item.dc:creator: @John459 John459
item.description:
@John459 wrote:

Little Johnny was sitting in class doing math problems when his teacher picked him to answer a question. “Johnny, if there were five birds sitting on a fence and you shot one, how many would be left?” “None,” replied Johnny, “cause the rest would fly away.” “Well, the answer is four,” said the teacher, “but I like the way you are thinking.” Little Johnny said ‘“I have a question for you now.” “If there were three women eating ice cream cones in a shop… one licking her cone, the second biting her cone, and the third one sucking her cone… which on is married?”’ “Well,” said the teacher nervously," “I guess the one sucking the cone?” “No,” said little Johnny. “the one with the wedding ring on her finger, but I like the way you are thinking.”

Read full topic

item.title: Joke Thread
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

I took my girlfriend on the most perfect date. We had a champagne picnic at a secluded park at sunset. The drink was flowing, I had her favourite strawberries, I got on one knee and asked her to be my wife and she said yes! Staring at her new diamond ring, she lent in and whispered “Could this moment ever get anymore special?”

So I got up and started walking about like a spaz.

Read full topic

item.title: Joke Thread
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

I was arrested yesterday for assaulting Naomi Campbell in a D.I.Y. store.

I only went in to get a Black and Decker.

Read full topic

@ranger_squad wrote:

Post your jokes. Rep++ if you like them, Rep-- if you don’t.
I will have the best 5 jokes on a section in the main post.

[center]_______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
Best Jokes
_______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________[/center]

I’ll start it off with a joke:

A Russian couple walks down a street in Moscow when the man feels a drop hit his nose.

“I think it’s raining,” he says to his wife.

“No, that feels like snow to me, dear,” she replies.

Just then, a minor communist party official walks towards them.

“Let’s not fight about it,” the man says. “Let’s ask Comrade Rudolph whether it’s officially raining or snowing.”

“It’s raining, of course,” Comrade Rudolph says and walks on.

But the woman insists, “I know that felt like snow.”

To which the man quietly says, “Rudolph the Red knows rain, dear.”
